title: The Inaugural Patch
summary: This is the very first version of the patch notes, setting up the new system and introducing some initial changes. More to come!

changes.name: Patch Notes System
changes.description: The website now has a dedicated page for patch notes! This will serve as a changelog for all future updates, big and small. I've definitely missed the first 2 years of patches but it starts now.

title: The First Update
summary: This is the first update to the patch notes, setting up the new system and introducing some initial changes. More to come!

changes.name: Book bar
changes.description: The book bar is now a thing in the playground! It's a simple bar that displays the books I'm reading and the progress I've made on them. It's a work in progress and will be updated as I read more books. I'm using the Google Books API to fetch the books and the progress is tracked in the browser's local storage.

title: TFT Match History Update
summary: I've now added some more content to the TFT page, including win/losses and placement data. I ran into some issues with rate limiting so I tried adding caching and rate limiting to the worker. However this limits the worker to only seeing up to 7 matches at a time so I'm not sure if it's worth it.
